title: I need help Identifying this Sans font. Thanks
author: travatoni

comments.content: A little distorted and confusing, but it finally looks like **[Verdana](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162840/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=MS-Windows-Fonts&ffam=Verdana%20-%20Regular&fid=7264cc65d6566409f5029e6766533872&fsize=36&text=We%20appreciate%20your%20custom%20forward%20receiving%20positive%20feedback&wrap=2)**
